message.name: SHURIKEN.NAME.U1
message.value: Light shurikens

message.name: SHURIKEN.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: You can throw one additional shuriken.

message.name: SHURIKEN.DESCR.U1
message.value: Compact and effective weapons. You can throw 5 shurikens per turn. The first direct hit on each enemy deals double damage.

message.name: SHURIKEN.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 17 hp per throw. The first direct hit at a target deals double damage.

message.name: SHURIKEN.NAME.U2A
message.value: Master knives

message.name: SHURIKEN.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Improved targeting. Damage caused by each knife is increased by 5 hp

message.name: SHURIKEN.DESCR.U2A
message.value: You have 5 knives per turn. The first direct hit on every enemy deals double damage. Additionally, targeting is highlighted.

message.name: SHURIKEN.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 22 hp per throw. The first direct hit at a target deals double damage.

message.name: SHURIKEN.NAME.U2B
message.value: Master shurikens

message.name: SHURIKEN.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: No bonus damage for the first hit. Instead, master shurikens go through several enemies, dealing high damage.

message.name: SHURIKEN.DESCR.U2B
message.value: Shurikens saw through enemies, dealing massive damage, and disappear only when they hit the ground. You can throw 4 shurikens per turn.

message.name: SHURIKEN.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 12-36 hp on each target.

message.name: SUPER_BOAR.NAME.U1
message.value: Raging boar

message.name: SUPER_BOAR.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage increased by 10 hp. Slows damaged units for 1 turn.

message.name: SUPER_BOAR.DESCR.U1
message.value: A controllable flying boar. It starts flying upwards when launched and explodes when bumps into the ground or any unit. Slows damaged unit for 1 turn.

message.name: SUPER_BOAR.NAME.U2
message.value: Thunder boar

message.name: SUPER_BOAR.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Damage increased by 10 hp. Smashes through thin ground layer.

message.name: SUPER_BOAR.DESCR.U2
message.value: A controllable flying boar. It starts flying upwards when launched and explodes when bumps into any unit. Slows damaged unit for 1 turn. Can smash through thin ground layer.

message.name: SUPER_BOAR.NAME.U2B
message.value: Greedy boar

message.name: SUPER_BOAR.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: When the boar picks a supply, its damage is increased by 45 (up to 5 times per launch).

dictionary.message: A controllable flying ram. It starts flying upwards when launched and explodes when bumps into the ground or any unit. Slows damaged unit for 1 turn. When the ram picks a supply, its damage is increased by 45 up to 5 times per launch. Easier to control.

message.name: SUPER_BOAR.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 70 hp.

message.name: CAT_STRIKE.NAME.U1
message.value: Double cat strike

message.name: CAT_STRIKE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: For this strike 2 targets are selected, and 2 explosive cats are dropped at each point. Delay is increased to 3 turns.

message.name: CAT_STRIKE.DESCR.U1
message.value: For this strike 2 targets are selected, and 2 cats are dropped at each point. Cats are not influenced by the wind. When hitting the ground, cats bounce to the random direction.

message.name: CAT_STRIKE.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 4 cats, 2 bounces, 50 hp of damage from every strike.

message.name: NAPALM_STRIKE.NAME.U1
message.value: Napalm bombs

message.name: NAPALM_STRIKE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Additional bomb, damage increased by 5 hp.

message.name: NAPALM_STRIKE.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 6 bombs, 25 hp each. Fire damage: 15-75 hp per second.

message.name: MORTAR.NAME.U1
message.value: Siege mortar

message.name: MORTAR.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Explosion damage increased by 10 hp. Improved targeting.

message.name: MORTAR.DESCR.U1
message.value: Launches a powerful missile that is unaffected by the wind. The initial speed can't be regualted. The missile emits 5 shards at the direction of an enemy when exploding. Additionally, targeting is highlighted.

message.name: MORTAR.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 45 hp from explosion, 5 fragments - 25 hp each.

message.name: MORTAR.NAME.U2A
message.value: Siege destroyer

message.name: MORTAR.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Explosion damage increased by 5 hp and damage from each shard - by 10 hp. Explosion radius is also increased.

message.name: MORTAR.DESCR.U2A
message.value: Launches a destructive missile that is unaffected by the wind. Missile and shards have a large explosion radius. Shards fly towards an enemy. Targeting is highlighted.

message.name: MORTAR.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 50 hp from explosion, 5 fragments - 35 hp each.

message.name: MORTAR.NAME.U2B
message.value: Multicharged mortar

message.name: MORTAR.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Shoots an additional missile after the first one.

message.name: MORTAR.DESCR.U2B
message.value: Fires two missiles at once! Initial speed can't be regualted. Shards fly towards an enemy. Targeting is highlighted.

message.name: MORTAR.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 40 hp from explosion, 5 fragments - 25 hp each.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.NAME.U1
message.value: F-1 grenade

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Emits additional fragment on explosion. Damage from explosion increased by 5 hp.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DESCR.U1
message.value: Grenades are unaffected by the wind. They deal massive damage with their fragments. They are very effectice in enclosed spaces. Can be triggered by hitting shoot button.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 45 hp from explosion, 9 fragments - 15 hp each.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.NAME.U2A
message.value: Piranha grenade

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Fragments automatically target the nearest enemies.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DESCR.U2A
message.value: Grenades are unaffected by the wind. They split into 9 fragments on explosion, which automatically target on one of the nearest enemies in just half a second. Can be triggered by hitting shoot button.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 45 hp from explosion, 9 fragments - 15 hp each.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.NAME.U2B
message.value: Sensory grenade

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Explodes automatically near the enemy, timer is absent. Fragments float to nearest enemy. If the grenade doesn't hit an enemy, it stays on the ground.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DESCR.U2B
message.value: Grenades are unaffected by the wind. They explode automatically when they come near an enemy. Can be triggered by hitting shoot button.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 45 hp from explosion, 9 fragments - 15 hp each.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Emits additional fragment on explosion.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DESCR.U1
message.value: Sticks to any surface. Releases 8 fragments that are unaffected by the wind and fly through the air.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 40 hp from explosion, 8 fragments - 20 hp each.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.NAME.U2A
message.value: Sticky poison

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: The grenade and its fragments leave poison for 2 turns.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DESCR.U2A
message.value: They stick to any surface, releasing 8 fragments that are unaffected by the wind. Grenades and their fragments leave poison for 2 turns.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 40 hp from explosion, 8 fragments - 20 hp each.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.NAME.U2B
message.value: Sticky mines

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Damage from the fragments is increased by 5 hp. Fragments that don't hit an enemy stay on the ground for 5 turns.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DESCR.U2B
message.value: They stick to any surface, releasing 8 fragments that are unaffected by the wind. Fragments that don't hit an enemy stay on the ground (like mines) for 5 turns.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 40 hp from explosion, 8 fragments - 25 hp each.

message.name: SHOTGUN.NAME.U1
message.value: Combat shotgun

message.name: SHOTGUN.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Two additional pellets, damage of each pellet is increased by 1 hp

message.name: SHOTGUN.DESCR.U1
message.value: Shoots 9 pellets in a volley. Effective in close combat.

message.name: SHOTGUN.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 9 pellets - 14 hp each.

message.name: SHOTGUN.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Damaged enemies are slowed for 2 turns. Damage of each pellet is increased by 1 hp more.

message.name: SHOTGUN.DESCR.U2A
message.value: Remington shots deal massive damage at close combat and slow enemies for 2 turns.

message.name: SHOTGUN.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 9 pellets - 15 hp each.

message.name: SHOTGUN.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Allows 2 shots of 6 pellets each.

message.name: SHOTGUN.DESCR.U2B
message.value: Devastating weapon for close combat, which shoots twice per turn.

message.name: SHOTGUN.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 6 pellets - 14 hp each, 2 shots.

message.name: MINIGUN.NAME.U1
message.value: Chain gun

message.name: MINIGUN.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage of each bullet is increased by 2 hp.

message.name: MINIGUN.DESCR.U1
message.value: Powerful minigun, capable of turning your enemy into a swiss cheese. Shoots 20 high damage bullets.

message.name: MINIGUN.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 20 bullets - 8 hp each.

message.name: MINIGUN.NAME.U2A
message.value: Big Lewis

message.name: MINIGUN.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Each direct hit at the enemy lowers his armor by 2 until the end of turn.

message.name: MINIGUN.DESCR.U2A
message.value: A heavy weapon specially created to take down armored targets. Each direct hit lowers the enemy's armor by 2 until the end of turn.

message.name: MINIGUN.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 20 bullets - 8 hp each.

message.name: MINIGUN.NAME.U2B
message.value: Rocket minigun

message.name: MINIGUN.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Shoots rockets instead of bulets, which can be guided towards enemies.

message.name: MINIGUN.DESCR.U2B
message.value: Shoots a volley of 10 rockets with high damage and explosion radius, and are capable of correcting their trajectory and aim directly at the enemy.

message.name: MINIGUN.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 10 rockets - 16 hp each.

message.name: NEGATOR.NAME.U1
message.value: Heal blocker mk2

message.name: NEGATOR.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Duration increased by 2 turns.

dictionary.message: Device that can be attached to any surface, which disables common healing methods for your enemy. Doesn't affect most bosses and rabbit regeneration. If an enemy destroys the blocker, he gets considerable damage. Lasts for 8 turns.

message.name: NEGATOR.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Deals 10 damage to all enemies every turn. Doesn't harm badly injured enemies (hp less than 10%).

dictionary.message: Device that can be attached to any surface, which disables common healing methods for your enemy. Doesn't affect most bosses and rabbit regeneration. If an enemy destroys the blocker, he gets considerable damage. Lasts for 8 turns. Damages enemies with more than 10% hit points.

message.name: NEGATOR.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 10 hp each turn.

message.name: NEGATOR.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Each turn restores 10 hp to allies if their health is below 80%, and 15 hp when the health is below 40%.

dictionary.message: Device that can be attached to any surface, which disables common healing methods for your enemy. Doesn't affect most bosses and rabbit regeneration. If an enemy destroys the blocker, he gets considerable damage. Lasts for 8 turns. Each turn restores 10 hp to allies if their health is below 80%, and 15 hp when the health is below 40%.

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.NAME.U1
message.value: Tactical rifle

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage increased by 15 hp. Laser beam fluctuations are lowered, and its length is increased.

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 105 hp for the first target.

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.NAME.U2A
message.value: Anti-tank rifle

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Ignores 40% of victim's armor, damage increased to 110 hp.

dictionary.message: Powerful heavy rifle capable to pierce several enemies with one shot, but each subsequent target gets lower damage. Ignores 40% of victim's armor.

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 110 hp for the first target.

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.NAME.U2B
message.value: Fly slayer

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: The shot can't be dodged, almost no beam fluctuations, but the damage is reduced to 80 hp.

dictionary.message: Accurate and deadly rifle capable to pierce several enemies with one shot, but each subsequent target gets lower damage. The shot can't be dodged by an enemy.

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 80 hp for the first target.

message.name: BUNKER_BUSTER.NAME.U1
message.value: Bunker crusher

message.name: BUNKER_BUSTER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Landscape penetration increased by 15%, damage increased by 5 hp, ignores 30% of target's armor.

message.name: BUNKER_BUSTER.DESCR.U1
message.value: Special missile that digs the way down and detonates once it encounters any unit or reaches the water. Ignores 30% of target's armor.

message.name: BUNKER_BUSTER.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 45 hp.

message.name: BUNKER_BUSTER.NAME.U2
message.value: Concussive bunker crusher

message.name: BUNKER_BUSTER.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Damage increased by 15 hp, ignores 50% of armor and slows the target.

message.name: BUNKER_BUSTER.DESCR.U2
message.value: Special missile that digs the way down and detonates once it encounters any unit or reaches the water. Ignores 50% of armor and slows the target for 1 turn.

message.name: BUNKER_BUSTER.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 60 hp.

message.name: METEOR.NAME.U1
message.value: Meteor shower

message.name: METEOR.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Invokes 3 meteors, each breaking into 2 fragments. Meteor damage: 55 hp., fragment damage: 35 hp. Delay is increased to 3 turns.

message.name: METEOR.DESCR.U1
message.value: Invokes 3 meteors which fall on the ground at random angles. On impact they break into 2 fragments.

message.name: METEOR.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 55 hp impact damage, 4 fragments, 35 hp each.

message.name: BAZOOKA.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage increased by 10 hp.

message.name: BAZOOKA.DESCR.U1
message.value: Improved standard weapon. Affected by the wind.

message.name: BAZOOKA.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 70 hp.

message.name: BAZOOKA.NAME.U2
message.value: Cumulative missile

message.name: BAZOOKA.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Allows you to destroy up to 2 obstacles with one shot. Makes 2 explosions, each dealing 40 hp of damage.

message.name: BAZOOKA.DESCR.U2
message.value: Allows you to take out an enemy who cowardly hid behind a wall. This missile destroys up to 2 obstacles and is affected by the wind.

message.name: BAZOOKA.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 2 explosions, 40 hp each.

message.name: GRENADE.NAME.U1
message.value: Hand bomb

message.name: GRENADE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Two additional minor explosions with 20 hp damage.

message.name: GRENADE.DESCR.U1
message.value: Improved grenade. Not affected by the wind. When the bomb explodes, it produces 2 minor explosions after a slight delay.

message.name: GRENADE.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 60 hp from first explosion, 20 hp from 2 minor explosions.

message.name: GRENADE.NAME.U2
message.value: Concussive grenade

message.name: GRENADE.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Slows damaged units for 1 turn, additional minor explosion. Explodes on contact with enemy.

message.name: GRENADE.DESCR.U2
message.value: Units hit by this grenade are slowed for 1 turn. Not affected by the wind. When the bomb explodes, it produces 3 minor explosions after a slight delay.

message.name: GRENADE.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 60 hp from first explosion, 20 hp from 3 additional explosions.

message.name: RIFLE.NAME.U1
message.value: Hunting rifle

message.name: RIFLE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Improved crosshair, damage from each bullet increased by 5 hp.

message.name: RIFLE.DESCR.U1
message.value: Perfect weapon for straight shots. You can make two shots per turn. Improved crosshair.

message.name: RIFLE.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 35 hp per shot, 2 shots.

message.name: AIR_STRIKE.NAME.U1
message.value: Homing strike

message.name: AIR_STRIKE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Rockets aim on target while flying.

message.name: AIR_STRIKE.DESCR.U1
message.value: Drops 5 rockets to the selected point. Rockets aim on target while flying!

message.name: HOMING.NAME.U1
message.value: Heat missile

message.name: HOMING.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage increases by the amount of time flying. Maximum bonus - 40 hp.

message.name: HOMING.DESCR.U1
message.value: Rockets reach the target following the shortest flight path. It works perfectly for long distances. Damage is increased by the amount of time that the rocket is in the air.

message.name: HOMING.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: from 60 to 100 hp.

message.name: HOMING.NAME.U2
message.value: Infrared missile

message.name: HOMING.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Maximum bonus damage from time flying is increased to 80 hp.

message.name: HOMING.DESCR.U2
message.value: Rockets reach the target following the shortest flight path. Damage is increased by the amount of time that the rocket is in the air. Great for long distances.

message.name: HOMING.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: from 60 to 140 hp.

message.name: HARPOON.NAME.U1
message.value: Whale gun

message.name: HARPOON.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage on hit is increased by 8 hp, improved crosshair.

message.name: HARPOON.DESCR.U1
message.value: Hooks and pulls an enemy, causing electrical damage while dragging your enemy closer. Improved crosshair.

message.name: HARPOON.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 35 hp when the target is hit, 10 hp/4 times per second while dragging the target.

message.name: HARPOON.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Electriccal damage increased by 30%.

message.name: HARPOON.DESCR.U2A
message.value: Hooks and pulls an enemy, dealing massive electrical damage while dragging your enemy. Improved crosshair.

message.name: HARPOON.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 35 hp when hits a target, 10 hp each 0.25s while dragging.

message.name: HARPOON.NAME.U2B
message.value: Energy rifle

message.name: HARPOON.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Shoots an energy bullet, which deals 45 damage and then strikes 3 times with electricity for 30 pure damage.

dictionary.message: Shoots energy bullet which deals damage on hit and then strikes 3 times with electricity, throwing unit into air. Electricity damage is not modified by attack or armor. Improved crosshair.

message.name: HARPOON.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 45 hp + 3 strikes for 30 hp each.

message.name: AUGER.NAME.U1
message.value: Improved auger

message.name: AUGER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Dig distance increased by 30%.

message.name: AUGER.DESCR.U1
message.value: Allows you to dig tunnels under the ground (either horizontally or at an angle). Slightly injures and pushes the enemy. Dig distance increased by 30%.

message.name: AUGER.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 24 hp per second.

message.name: AUGER.NAME.U2
message.value: Tactical auger

message.name: AUGER.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Tunnel made by auger gets covered by the hatch, which explodes on the next turn.

dictionary.message: Allows you to dig tunnels under the ground. You can control the angle by up/down keys. Tunnel made by auger gets covered by the hatch, which explodes on the next turn.

message.name: PNEUMATIC_DRILL.NAME.U1
message.value: Secure drill

message.name: PNEUMATIC_DRILL.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Tunnel made by drill gets covered by the hatch, which explodes on the next turn.

message.name: PNEUMATIC_DRILL.DESCR.U1
message.value: Drill is used to dig down vertical tunnels. Tunnel made by drill gets covered by the hatch, which explodes on the next turn.

message.name: PNEUMATIC_DRILL.NAME.U2
message.value: Miner's kit

message.name: PNEUMATIC_DRILL.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: You may use your blow torch after using the drill.

message.name: PNEUMATIC_DRILL.DESCR.U2
message.value: Drill is used to dig down vertical tunnels. Tunnel made by drill gets covered by the hatch, which explodes on the next turn. You may use your blow torch after using the drill on the same turn.

dictionary.message: Behaves just like a grenade. Allows the user to relocate to the place, where the teleport happened to stop after a toss. You may press SHOOT to teleport before full stop with 1 second delay.

message.name: TELE_THROWER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Allows to teleport before full stop by pressing the attack button.

message.name: TELEPORT.NAME.U1A
message.value: Teleport mk2

message.name: TELEPORT.DISTINCT.U1A
message.value: Additional 35 damage at initial point.

message.name: TELEPORT.DESCR.U1A
message.value: Allows the unit to teleport to any area of the map. Deals small damage both at initial and target points. Spends a turn.

message.name: TELEPORT.DAMAGE.U1A
message.value: 35 hp.

message.name: TELEPORT.NAME.U1B
message.value: Medical teleport

message.name: TELEPORT.DISTINCT.U1B
message.value: Doesn't allow to move underground, but restores 40 hp with each use and allow to use antifreeze if available.

message.name: TELEPORT.DESCR.U1B
message.value: Allows the unit to teleport to any area of the map. Minimal area size must be greater then unit size. Does small damage. Spends a turn. Restores 40 hp with each use and allow to use antifreeze if available.

message.name: MINE.NAME.U1
message.value: Antipersonnel mine

message.name: MINE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage increased by 5 hp.

message.name: MINE.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 50 hp.

message.name: MINE.NAME.U2
message.value: Destruction mine

message.name: MINE.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Explosion radius increased, damage increased by additional 5 hp.

message.name: MINE.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 55 hp.

message.name: UZI.NAME.U1
message.value: Modernized Uzi

message.name: UZI.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: The damage of each bullet is increased by 1 hp.

message.name: UZI.DESCR.U1
message.value: Shoots in short bursts, almost no disperse. Can be controlled while shooting.

message.name: UZI.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 16 bullets, 6 hp each.

message.name: BARRIER.NAME.U1
message.value: Laser defense

message.name: BARRIER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: You may use 1 additional generator.

message.name: BARRIER.NAME.U2
message.value: Laser matrix

message.name: BARRIER.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: You may use 1 additional generator. Damage increased by 5 hp. Increased binding distance.

message.name: BARRIER.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 10 hp.

message.name: HOLY_GRENADE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage increased by 20 hp and increases the explosion radius.

message.name: SPIDER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Shoots a poison bolt at its victim, aside from explosion. The bolt deals 10 damage and always hits the target.

message.name: SPIDER.DESCR.U1
message.value: Tarantula crawls up to an enemy and stands on it. If the enemy moves, the spider will detonate and fire a poison bolt.

message.name: SPIDER.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 65 hp from explosion, 10 hp from poison bolt.

message.name: BOOMERANG.NAME.U1
message.value: Balanced boomerang

message.name: BOOMERANG.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage from second hit increased by 15 hp.

message.name: BOOMERANG.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 65 hp from first hit, 80 hp from second.

message.name: BOOMERANG.NAME.U2
message.value: Deadly boomerang

message.name: BOOMERANG.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Damage increased by 10 hp, second ht knocks enemy's hat down.

message.name: BOOMERANG.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 75 hp from first hit, 90 hp from second.

dictionary.message: When boomerang hits the enemy or the ground, it bounces, and you may try to catch it and throw again. For the second throw, boomerang won't bounce. Greatly affected by the wind. Knocks enemy's hat down.

message.name: GIRDER.NAME.U1
message.value: Elastic girder

message.name: GIRDER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Enables to change girder size before placement.

message.name: GIRDER.NOTE.U1
message.value: Cannot be placed on the ground or near other objects. You may change the size before placement by up/down buttons.

message.name: DYNAMITE.NAME.U1A
message.value: Dynamite bundle

message.name: DYNAMITE.DISTINCT.U1A
message.value: On explosion 2 sticks fly away and explode on collision.

dictionary.message: Detonates in 3 seconds after setup, leaving a large hole in the ground. On explosion 2 sticks fly away and explode on collision with ground or unit.

message.name: DYNAMITE.DAMAGE.U1A
message.value: 75 hp from the first explosion, 55 hp from each stick.

message.name: DYNAMITE.NAME.U1B
message.value: Kamikaze belt

message.name: DYNAMITE.DISTINCT.U1B
message.value: The unit explodes at the end of a turn, dealing 70 hp of damage. Belt activation doesn't spend a turn.

dictionary.message: Kamikaze belt gives a chance to heavily wounded units to deal decent damage at their last turn. Activation doesn't spend a turn. At the end of a turn unit explodes, dealing damage to nearby units and to the ground.

message.name: DYNAMITE.DAMAGE.U1B
message.value: 70 hp at the end of a turn

message.name: CAT_BAZOOKA.NAME.U1
message.value: Cat thrower

message.name: CAT_BAZOOKA.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Cat damage increases per each bounce.

message.name: CAT_BAZOOKA.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 2 bounces, 50 hp first strike damage, every bounce increases damage by 5 hp.

dictionary.message: Shoots a cat which bounces several times at a random direction. After the bounce cat aims on the first target hit.

message.name: CAT_BAZOOKA.NAME.U2A
message.value: Chaotic cat thrower

message.name: CAT_BAZOOKA.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Cas get additional bounce.

message.name: CAT_BAZOOKA.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 3 bounces, 50 hp first strike damage, every bounce increases damage by 5 hp.

message.name: CAT_BAZOOKA.NAME.U2B
message.value: Burning cat thrower

message.name: CAT_BAZOOKA.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Cats ignite the land on impact.

dictionary.message: Shoots a cat which bounces several times at a random direction. After the bounce cat aims on the first target hit. Cats ignite the land on impact.

message.name: PARASITE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: If the leech kills an enemy, it restores 100% of final damage to its owner.

message.name: PARASITE.DESCR.U1
message.value: Latches to an enemy instead of exploding. On the next turn leech will slow its victim and then explode in 10 seconds. If the leech kills an enemy, it restores 100% of final damage to its owner.

message.name: PARASITE.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Prevents target from using turn switch.

dictionary.message: Latches to an enemy instead of exploding. On the next turn leech will slow its victim, prevents it from using turn switch and then explode in 10 seconds. If the slime kills an enemy, it restores 100% of final damage to its owner.
Parasite damage isn't the greatest, but its main purpose is to trouble your opponent on his next turn. Your enemy won't be able to use turn switch to escape interruption!

message.name: SHOCKER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Slows the damaged targets for 2 turns, increased damage.

dictionary.message: Close combat weapon based on the direct impact of electric charge on the biological target. Damaged units are slowed for 2 turns.

message.name: SHOCKER.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 50 hp + fall damage.

message.name: SHOCKER.NAME.U2
message.value: Arc lightning

message.name: SHOCKER.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 50 hp + fall damage, 1 bounce

message.name: SHOCKER.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: The charge bounces to nearest enemy in medium radius.

dictionary.message: Removes ice from the user and protects him from freezing and slowing for 2 turns. Also heals 60 hp and cures poison. Spends a turn!

message.name: ANTIFREEZE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Cures poison, health gain increased by 10 hp.

message.name: ANTIFREEZE.NAME.U2A
message.value: Amanita potion

dictionary.message: Drink of true berserker! Removes ice from the user, increases attack by 30% and protects him from freezing and slowing for 2 turns. Also heals 70 hp and cures poison. Spends a turn!

message.name: ANTIFREEZE.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Increases attack by 30%, health gain increased by additional 10 hp.

message.name: ANTIFREEZE.NAME.U2B
message.value: Potion of stoneskin

dictionary.message: Removes ice from the user, increases armor by 30% and protects him from freezing and slowing for 2 turns. Also heals 70 hp and cures poison. Spends a turn!

message.name: ANTIFREEZE.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Increases armor by 30%, health gain increased by additional 10 hp.

message.name: SWINE.NAME.U1A
message.value: Controlled swine

message.name: SWINE.DISTINCT.U1A
message.value: Controlled movement. Increased damage.

message.name: SWINE.DESCR.U1A
message.value: Robotic swine, which can be controlled by left/right keys.

message.name: SWINE.NAME.U1B
message.value: Burning swine

message.name: SWINE.DISTINCT.U1B
message.value: Throws fire while running.

message.name: SWINE.DESCR.U1B
message.value: Moves at the pointed direction but can turn around if runs into an obstacle or try to jump over it. Throws fire while running.

message.name: GUARDING_BOT.NAME.U1A
message.value: Cloaked guardian

message.name: GUARDING_BOT.DISTINCT.U1A
message.value: Becomes invisible for enemy on your next turn, briefly reveals itself at the beginning of enemy's turn.

dictionary.message: Defensive device, jumps into the air when enemy approaches and attacks it. Can be triggered only by enemies standing on the ground. If there was no unit nearby while installing the guardian, the turn is not spent. Becomes invisible for enemy on your next turn.

message.name: GUARDING_BOT.NAME.U1B
message.value: Spiky gaurdian

message.name: GUARDING_BOT.DISTINCT.U1B
message.value: The guardian can be thrown at a distance, also it attaches to any surface.

dictionary.message: Defensive device, jumps into the air when enemy approaches and attacks it. Can be triggered only by enemies standing on the ground. If there was no unit nearby while installing the guardian, the turn is not spent. The guardian can be thrown at a distance, also it attaches to any surface.

message.name: BARRIER.NAME.U1
message.value: Laser defense

message.name: BARRIER.NAME.U2
message.value: Laser matrix

message.name: BARRIER.NOTE.U2
message.value: Increased binding distance.

message.name: BARRIER.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 10 hp.

message.name: ROPE.NAME.U1
message.value: Ninja rope

dictionary.message: This rope can be used not only to climb obstacles, but also to gather supplies. Increased length and rope speed.

message.name: ROPE.NAME.U2
message.value: Engineer rope

dictionary.message: This rope can be used not only to climb obstacles, but also to gather supplies. Automatically shoots in the direction of a nearby supply and picks it.

message.name: EMERGENCY_TELEPORT.NAME.U1
message.value: Emergency teleport mk2

message.name: EMERGENCY_TELEPORT.DESCR.U1
message.value: Instantly transfers your unit to a random point a medium distance away. Doesn't cost a turn. Can be used in the air. Increased travel radius.

message.name: EMERGENCY_TELEPORT.DESCR.U2
message.value: Instantly transfers unit to a random point at a middle range. Doesn't waste a turn. Can be used in the air. Avoids mines and laser beams.

message.name: EMERGENCY_TELEPORT.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Always avoids mines and laser beams.

message.name: EMERGENCY_TELEPORT.DESCR.U3
message.value: Teleports the user to nearby medkit. If there are no medkits around, moves unit to a random safe point.

message.name: EMERGENCY_TELEPORT.DISTINCT.U3
message.value: Teleports to nearby medkit.

message.name: SPIDER.NAME.U1B
message.value: Frost spider

message.name: SPIDER.DISTINCT.U1B
message.value: Reduced explosion damage, spider shoots an ice missile that freezes enemy for 1 turn.

dictionary.message: The spider crawls up to an enemy and stands on it. If the enemy moves out, the spider will detonate and shoot an ice missile that freezes enemy for 1 turn.

message.name: SPIDER.DAMAGE.U1B
message.value: 30 hp explosion damage, 25 hp ice spike damage.

message.name: GRAVITY_GUN.NAME.U1
message.value: Gravity rifle

message.name: GRAVITY_GUN.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Improved targeting, damage increased by 10 hp.

dictionary.message: Pushes an enemy with great force. You can shoot just below yourself to make a powerful jump and reach higher ground. Can be shot twice per turn. Improved targeting.

message.name: GRAVITY_GUN.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 2 shots, 30 hp each

message.name: GRAVITY_GUN.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Allows to pull and throw various objects.

dictionary.message: Pulls and throws away objects within crosshair reach. Medkits and weapon crates explode if thrown this way. If there are no valid objects to pull, shoots 2 missiles that push an enemy with great force.

message.name: FREEZER.NAME.U1
message.value: Cryogenic bazooka

message.name: FREEZER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Direct hit on frozen unit has damage and freeze time increased by 50%

dictionary.message: Shoots special missile which freezes units within area of effect. Missile is affected by the wind. Direct hit on frozen unit has damage and freeze time increased by 50%.

message.name: FREEZER.NAME.U2A
message.value: Ice spike

message.name: FREEZER.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Damage increased by 20, missile aims on enemies. Deals bonus damage to slowed targets.

dictionary.message: Shoots a missile which aims on nearest enemy and freezes units within area of effect. Missile is affected by the wind. Direct hit on frozen or slowed unit has damage and freeze time increased by 50%.

message.name: FREEZER.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 60 hp

message.name: FREEZER.NAME.U1B
message.value: Snow thrower

message.name: FREEZER.DISTINCT.U1B
message.value: You can shoot 2 times per turn, but damage is decreased by 20, and freeze duration by 1 turn.

dictionary.message: Shoots missiles that freeze units within area of effect. Missile is affected by the wind. You may perform 2 shots per turn.

message.name: FREEZER.DAMAGE.U1B
message.value: 2 shots, 20 hp per shot.

message.name: FREEZER.NAME.U2B
message.value: Snow launcher

message.name: FREEZER.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Improved crosshair and fixed shot power, damage increased by 10.

dictionary.message: Shoots missiles that freeze units within area of effect. Missile is affected by the wind. You may perform 2 shots per turn. Improved crosshair and fixed shot power.

message.name: FREEZER.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 2 shots, 30 hp per shot.

message.name: AIR_BLOCKER.NAME.U1
message.value: Magnet grounding bot

message.name: AIR_BLOCKER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Grounding bot also affects flying objects, such as: UFO, helicopter, super boar.

dictionary.message: Device which can be attached to any surface to damage nearby enemies and destroy flying objects that stay in the air for too long. Stays for 10 turns, increasing its radius every turn. Doesn't spend a turn.

message.name: AIR_BLOCKER.NAME.U1B
message.value: Winter guardian

message.name: AIR_BLOCKER.DISTINCT.U1B
message.value: Extinguishes fire in large radius, freezes damaged enemies for 1 turn.

dictionary.message: Device which can be attached to any surface to damage nearby enemies that stay in the air for too long. Stays for 10 turns, increasing its radius every turn. Doesn't spend a turn. Extinguishes fire in large radius, freezes damaged enemies for 1 turn. Doesn't spend a turn.

message.name: PUSHING_MINE.NAME.U1
message.value: Tactical stunt mine

message.name: PUSHING_MINE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: You can place the mine on empty space and push enemies onto it.

dictionary.message: This mine can be put under the enemy and it tosses him up in 3 seconds, so you can attack him in midair. If you place it one empty space, it'll trigger when enemy moves or flies above it (or will disappear automatically in 5 seconds). Doesn't deal damage and doesn't waste a turn.
